content.description: Start at the platform and follow the arete that forms the right edge of the couloir. Follow it up and through the short vertical section at the top (crux) to chains slightly to your right.
content.location: The route is on the arete of the main wall and forms the right edge of the couloir. Rappel or lower from chains. Fantastic view from the top.

content.description: From the Platform, climb mostly horizontal and left, traverse into and through the back of the couloir and follow bolts left and out onto the face. Â Continue straight up on bolts. This is the left most route. Airy and exciting, BIG cobbles.
content.location: Rap or lower from Chain anchors back to the Platform. A bit of trickery is required to move back across the couloir, clean your draws and get back onto the Platform.

content.description: Sweet route. Not really a cruxy section, just sustained.
content.location: From the platform move theft of the arete and into the back of the couloir. This is actually a little "airy" as the couloir drops out from under you and the start is already 30' off the ground. The first bolt is visible directly in front of you. This route follows the left edge of the couloir but as the couloir moves up and right the route pretty much ascends straight up the wall.
